snippet: Jeb Bush mentioned two rivals for the Republican presidential nomination in defending birthright citizenship, saying they might not be able to run for president if some in the conservative wing of the Republican Party had their way.
abstract: Jeb Bush mentioned two rivals for the Republican presidential nomination in defending birthright citizenship, saying they might not be able to run for president if some in the conservative wing of the Republican Party had their way.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Cites Ted Cruz and Marco Rubio in Defending Birthright Citizenship
